name: Babo - The Caveman
description:
Play as Babo, a lone caveman on an adventure through the era of Human civilization!

Find your way out of 10 labyrinthes and collect artifacts to decorate your cavern!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Interact

Mouse - Select and place objects

Music credits:

Morning Mood - Berliner Philharmoniker, Herbert von Karajan

Land Battle - Sid Meier's Pirates! OST: 

 Egypt theme - Rise of Kingdom OST

Gladius - Bignic

Quotation From The Tragedy “ORESTIS” - Unknown artist

Tea ceremony - Brandon Fiechter

Chant for the Old Gods - Breakdown Epiphanies

Village - Unknown artist

The Attaignant Consort - Various artists

Lux - La Reverdie

Victorian Era Dance and Music - Kayla Ordaz and Jessica Donahue

Make a name - Breakdown Epiphanies
